quote_first: For the next fifteen minutes he lugged the cases of wine and beer up the stairs, constantly stopping to check his watch, and at
quote_last: he opened the back door to find the German corporal jumping up and down and slapping his sides in an effort to keep warm.
title: The Sins of the Father
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: Lieutenant Hershel Mote could not keep the note of near hysteria out of his voice when Wesley returned his telephone call at
quote_last: “You’re where?” Wesley asked him again on the speaker phone.
title: The Body Farm
author: Patricia Cornwell
